name: GetActorVirtualWorld
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.7 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Get the virtual world of an actor.

params_body.name: actorid
params_body.description: The ID of the actor to get the virtual world of.

return_values: The virtual world of the actor. By default this is 0. Also returns 0 if actor specified does not exist.
related_fn: SetActorVirtualWorld: Set the virtual world of an actor.
